entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 6.
